contentrichtext.text: {{more footnotes|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox prepared food | name = zapiekanka | image = [[File:Zapiekanka 2..jpg|Zapiekanka|200px]] | caption = "Student's Zapiekanka" | alternate_name = | country = [[Poland]] | region = | creator = | course = | type = | served = | main_ingredient = [[bread]], [[mushrooms]], [[cheese]], [[ham]], [[meat]], [[vegetable]] | variations = | calories = | other = }} '''Zapiekanka''' (derived from ''zapiekać'' – "to scorch", "to roast") is a [[Poland|Polish]] halved [[baguette]] or bread topped mainly with [[mushrooms]] and [[cheese]], also [[ham]] or other types of meat, and vegetables. Beside some basic versions there are several recipes like: "zapiekanka na ostro" (spicy Zapiekanka) and "zapiekanka z mięsem" (Zapiekanka with meat). They are usually placed in an oven until the cheese melts and the [[baguette]] or bread is crispy. It is served scalloped and usually topped with dressings like [[ketchup]] and chives. It’s a very popular fast food in Poland. Sidewalk sale prices range between 3 and 7 [[Polish złoty|zł]] for an approx. 25–50 cm long Zapiekanka. A very popular type of Zapiekanka is a "student's Zapiekanka", sometimes also called "whatever Zapiekanka". It is made of whatever is at home at the moment, and the only compulsory ingredients are bread and cheese. It's very commonly served (as an alternative to sandwiches) to unexpected guests if the host has nothing else to serve. It's also a quick dish for students, sometimes taking even less time to make than an instant soup. As it can be stored in the fridge before baking, many students prepare a full plate of them at the weekend so that they have something quick and nutritious to eat for the whole week. <gallery align="center" widths="200px" heights="200px" perrow=4> File:Zapiekanki.jpg| File:Zapiekanka 3..jpg| </gallery> == See also == * [[Street food]] * [[List of sandwiches]] ==References== <references/> == Further reading == * {{cite book |last = Chwalba | first = Andrzej | author2 = and others | title = Obyczaje w Polsce | publisher = Wydawnictwo Naukowe PWN | place = Warszawa | year = 2006 | pages = 380 | isbn = 83-01-14253-7 }} {{clear}} {{Commons category}} [[Category:Polish cuisine]] [[Category:Sandwiches]]
